wblut.hemesh

Class HEM_Noise

  • java.lang.Object
    • wblut.hemesh.HEM_Modifier
      • wblut.hemesh.HEM_Noise
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HE_Machine

    public class HEM_Noise
extends HEM_Modifier
    Expands or contracts all vertices along the vertex normals.
    Author:
    Frederik Vanhoutte (W:Blut)
